def fact(f):
    if f==1 or f==0 :
        return 1
    if f!=1:
        sweet=1
        while f>0:
            sweet=sweet*f
            f=f-1
        return sweet
        
t=input()


for p in range(t):
    k=raw_input().split()
    a,b=(int(k[0]),int(k[1]))
    if (int(a)-int(b))<0:
       print "1"
    else:
       print  fact(int(a))/(fact(int(b))*fact(int(a-b)))
